Side Effects: Bloating_ stomach cramps_ nausea_ diarrhea and depression
Comments: I have never had any drug reactions or with anything else. Thoroughly disappointed! This should not be on market.

Side Effects: Severe nausea and stomach pain.Sulfur smelling burps. Super drained and exhausted.

While this medicine stopped the bleeding catheter infection_ it caused a bunch of other reactions. I had severe diarrhea_ went to ER for dehydration and stomach pain. After catheter was removed_ I had icy cold chills combined with sweating_ crying_ exhaustion_ and joint pain. Some breathing restriction too. I'm grateful it healed the infection_ but it caused a host of other problems I really could have gone without.
Oh my god please don't take it it have really bad side effect I loss my sense of smell and taste I m so much worried when I will get normal smooch pain headache
Terrible headache_ sore throat_ always feeling tired & beat ! I'm consider healthy but on this medicine feeling terrible.
Terrible headache_ sore throat_ always feeling tired & beat ! I'm consider healthy but on this medicine feeling terrible.
Very tired. Stomach pain nauseated  but mostly tired and feeling drained.
Hyper_ a little anxious...turned into insomnia and heartburn...and increasingly emotional. Took probiotics with it. Stopped my course as it was only preventative. Was supposed to be 10 days.
Comments: I hate these types of antibiotics. They should not be prescribed.

Side Effects: Intense headache_ tiredness_ low energy.
Comments: I have never had any side effects from any medications_ but this one was really bad. It seems to be working on the infection but it makes it difficult to do any work with the headache and exhaustion.

Side Effects: lethargic_ cognitive issues_ worsened anxiety_ heart palpitations_ depression_ irritability
Comments: 1st day: Was super lethargic and depressed2nd day: Was even more depressed and in the middle of work I started to get real dizzy and my heart started to race.  I couldn't breathe and my legs and hands went numb.  My boss called an ambulance and they rushed me to a nearby hospital.  The entire time I thought I was going to die.  It took me about 30-45 minutes to calm down.  They couldn't find out what was wrong with me after blood work and CT scans(I think it could've been a panic attack) but after that I still haven't felt right.  3rd Day: I tried to call my Dr. (although it was a weekend so it was a nurse on call) and I had to do the run around from them to the ER to the pharmacist_ back to the ER where I got the antibiotics from and they told me to keep taking the antibiotics because they doubted it was a reaction.4th day: I'm still really dizzy and tired.  My hearts still beating really hard (not fast at least) and on and off I feel the sensation of what I felt on day 2_ but I'm (hopefully) able to control it.Seriously_ if this isn't a reaction then why the hell am I feeling like this when this is the only thing I've been taking??  Also to add note_ I was DIRECTED to take it 4 times a day. After day 2 I dropped it down to 3.

Side Effects: Have nausea_ diarrhea and severe joint pain. I'm going to have to call my doctor tomorrow. I can't keep taking this
Extreme stomach pain_ total insomnia_ feelings of anxiety_ dread_ losing her mind.
Comments: At her age_ I do not think this should have been prescribed to my mother as a preventative!  She became severely ill (stomach pain) and felt like she was going crazy.

Side Effects: I am allergic to most antibiotics so hoped this would be ok. Taken it for 3 days .. Feel absolutely exhausted _and hot . Day one I had a terrible headache but that's gone now. Will continue as other options I have had worse symptons !
I had nausea dizziness fever and chills and feeling of dread. Side hurts too and it never started hurting till I took this med. Will never take again
Comments: To many side effects to keep on the market. You are trying to get better not worse.

Side Effects: Anxiety sleep deprivation fatigue I currently take antidepressant I'm more depressed irritabillity
I'm experiencing unusual  chest pains and the itching is almost unbearable
Comments: It has somewhat helped my pantyline irritation  but not totally  and I can't keep taking this med I'm calling my Doctor  first thing in the morning

Side Effects: This is the second time taking this. My first was  to prevent infection after oral surgery. Never noticed anything (probably because I was in pain already). This time _ omg first few days I'm fine. This is day 4 now the joint pain is on the arm of the infection and my fingers feel itchy. Makes it feel like you have the flu. It did cure the infection but guess I'll take it the remainder of the time being as I don't want this to resurface. I thought it was just me having these pains. Didnt notice it was a side effect.
Comments: The joint pain is unbearable and the itchy hand is the worst.

Side Effects: Cramps_ heavier period (I was on it when prescribed)_ cramps_ restless night_ really bad sweating.
Comments: I have nothing else to say about it..

Side Effects: Nausea_ horrible diarrhea_ could smell the  antibiotic and taste it all the time_ horrible stomach cramps_ period came over a week early_ splitting headaches_ constantly felt tired or worn down_ lightheaded_ acid reflux_ made me plain miserable
Comments: Took care of the strep but I have never had side affects from a medicine before this and I seemed to get a bunch of side affects from this one.. Worst medicine I've ever taken

Side Effects: GI upset_ nausea_ headaches_ insomnia_ loss of appetite_ increased thirst... For almost a whole month!
Comments: This was the worst experience I've had to a medication_ honestly. I was sick for nearly a month. I didn't take the entire medication because I kept complaining to my doctor until she gave me the okay to stop taking it. I seriously felt so sick and miserable that I didn't feel like doing much of anything at all. I took as many probiotics as I could and I still had a lot of GI problems and nausea. On top of all that_ it smells like a mixture between rotten eggs and a permanent marker. I don't think I'll be taking this drug again.

Side Effects: Chills_ joint pain_ head ache_ absent-minded_ spacy_ felt downright stupid.  Then the g.i. stuff hit.  Loose_ mucousy stools.  Very bad lower abdominal pain.  Back ache_  feeling of unreality_ anxiety and dread_ insomnia. I called Dr. and begged to be switched to a different antibiotic.
Comments: The literature that came with the drug said to take this med "with care" if you are 65 or older.  As we age_ humans produce fewer of the enzymes that break down this and other meds and help to clear them from the system.  So we end up with super high concentrations of the drug in our blood.  In my opinion_ nobody over 50 should have to take it_ or the dosage ought to be reduced.

Side Effects: I didn't have any side effects really_ I took probiotics with it daily_ no stomach ache or change in stool. I did itch a little but nothing else. Last two days I started to have absolutely no appetite and nausea whenever I ate which has subsided_ and very bad dizziness that's even worse now (2 days off it) hopefully it goes away soon as I know it says in the your system for a few days once you stop. Other than that no other side effects. I was very emotional and had anxiety but not sure if it's related.

The company that manufactures this drug should be shut down completely. infact this drug should be removed from the market. I tell you I had sleepless nights taking this drug. Just to sum it up I will be completely crazy to take this drug ever again. Trust me dont.

It feels as if someone is squeezing my head together. My head_ face_ chest feel heavy. I went to emergency last night only to be told this is a side effect and to tough it out until last day which is tomorrow. I can't focus with the heavy feeling I am experiencing.
Comments: The pain and redness of breast has gone down

Side Effects: High pressure feeling in ears as if on a jet_ loss of hearing_ psychedelic patters on left eye peripheral_ constant feeling of being disconnected_ confusion_ and forgetting things_ lack of attention & focus_ spacey feeling when driving_ sporadic diarrhea_ vertigo_ freezing hands & feet_ body chill.
Comments: I had taken this drug in 2001 and I did not experience any of these side effects previously. I have no health issues_ live a very clean/healthy lifestyle so I'm very concerned with these symptoms that I encountered this time around. I read that Type O patients are allergic to penicillin based antibiotics and should not use them.

Reason: breast abscess inside and on skin

Reason: for a fungus infection on my foot
Side Effects: I am allergic to penicillin  but pharmacist and dr assured me only 1% of people react to this drug_ even though is from same family of penicillin. Medicine works to remove the fungus_ but will likely kill you.
Comments: Look up heart attack symptoms_ I had all of them. I took the medication for a few days already_ 20 pills out of the 28 given and had flu like symptoms at first_ but by the 20th pill_ I was about to pay it with my life. NEVER AGAINAnaphylaxis is a rare_ life-threatening allergic reaction that causes the widespread dysfunction of body systems. Signs and symptoms of anaphylaxis include: trouble breathingNausea or abdominal crampsVomiting or diarrheaDizziness or lightheadednessWeak_ rapid pulseDrop in blood pressureSeizures like jerkingLoss of consciousness (but not lose consciousness_ but had light headed_ put ice all though the day at head_ neck_ back_ chest)HEART ATTACK SYMPTOMS

Side Effects: Severe case of panic attack and anxiety from the day I stopped the medication
Comments: Suprisingly didn't seem to impact me while I was on it

Side Effects: I didn't realize it was part of the reaction the first couple days but blurred vision and lack of energy.  Then night 3 I just couldn't warm up_ I thought I was just really cold.  After the 4th pill is when it all really kicked in.  Muscles sore and achy_ blurred vision_ severe stomach cramping.  Followed by uncontrollable and intensely scary chills and almost nerve like damage feeling shaking.  Vomited violently 3-4 times_ couldn't even keep water down for more than 20-30 minutes and severe diarrhea_ as someone else noted like a faucet.  I would NEVER recommend or take this drug!
Acid reflux_ headache_ body aches_extreme fatigue_white coated tongue_ maybe oral thrush_ diarrhea.

I thought the headaches were due to just being tired_ but after reading reviews_ it's not just me. I have had horrible headaches_ and my skin has been itchy (thought that was because of dry weather. It also did nothing for my infection. Just started taking doxycycline_ we'll see how this works. So sad and frustrated :(
Headache and naseua
Comments: To be fair_ it did relieve the symptoms of the infection but my god the headache that comes with it is unbearable - like my whole skull is on fire. There's no relief from it other than to stop taking the antibiotics. Had the same problem with Trimethoprim as well_ so will steer clear of these two in the future.

Side Effects: diarrhea_ nausea_ dizziness_ weakness_ fatigue_ anxiety_ hot flushes
Comments: Never again!

Side Effects: Serious anxiety_ dizziness_ bad heart palpitations_ trouble breathing_ insomnia_ and trouble concentrating.
Comments: This medication is a nightmare! I was prescribed to take this once every 8hrs. My symptoms just kept getting worse_ on the pamphlet that describes the side effects of this medication_ actually did not state any side effects. After taking my morning dose on my 8th day (yesterday) and by yesterday afternoon_ I was in the shower with such a terrible anxiety attack (not to mention_ I have severe anxiety disorder already_ that I take medication for)_ I decided to look up what the side effects were for this medications. I read some of the comments from other people on here_ and thought_ exactly! I decided I was not going to take it for a couple days_ just to see if it is what is causing all the things I have been feeling.  This is what is causing all this_ how the heck can this medication even be on the market?? I am on day 1 of not taking it_ as of yet_ I am still feeling the same way_ but I will wait another day or 2 to see how I feel_ If possible_ I will update my status on here. If that is not possible_ I will make a new post.

Side Effects: I had a nasty infection and had one day IV antibiotics and 3 days tablets to complete the treatment. I took both cephalexin and metronidazole 500mg every 8 hours.I had dihareah from first day andThe last day I developed a server stomach ache_ had to eat yogurts_ and now I have an east infection. My side effects were minor.

Headache beyond bearable can't sleep through the night because of the headache. There is also pressure and dizziness and nausea threw up a few times I cannot take the pain it's worse than the ear infection. Going to ER today have to find relief
Sweats_ heart palpitations headache
Comments: Will never use drug again!  I've had the sweats and a violent headache two straight days where my head feels like it's going to pop.

Side Effects: Chest pain_ strong palpitations_ anxiety_ stiff neck_ chills_ hot flashes_ sweating_ anxious_ restlessness_ severe diarrhea_swollen and tender stomach.
Comments: I will never take again. Quit taking after 5 days.

Side Effects: Bad stomach ache
Dizzy!_ nauseated_ headache_ insomnia
Comments: Took this 3 times a day for a skin rash. Side effects are very intense. I'm suppose to take this for 2 weeks bu can't handle it anymore.

Side Effects: I am on day five of taking cephalexin and I'm going to stop it immediately. I was prescribed to take seven days as a postoperative preventative. This is the worst antibiotic I have ever taken and I will never take it again. I am so dizzy that I feel like I am about to pass out. I have been feeling like this for the past couple of days (since day 4) and now the end of day 5 I can't even take another dose. My heart is racing.I felt like I was going to die earlier today. I feel like my brain has a mushroom cloud exploding in it and my sinuses have gotten kind of weird from it. The visual disturbances are so bad that the walls look like they are moving and it is VERY SCARY. I'm having the feeling of "Will this ever stop?" I do not recommend this at all and I'm surprised they even use this drug.
I was told it didn't matter if I ate or not with this drug. Either way it makes me throw up. They put me on this specific one because I'm 7 weeks pregnant.  I refuse to take this medication again .

At first tired_ sluggish_ now on day 4 heart races from time to time_ eurythmias_ floaters_ neck and shoulders ache and are stiff_ feel hot but no fever_ persistent headache between and above eyes and below ears_ and dizzy_ disoriented feeling like I'm walking on styrofoam. Unpleasant.
Comments: The pharm companies need to look at these sites for their research

Side Effects: Liquid diarrhea_ abdominal and stomach pain_ nausea_ vomiting_ chills.  Was getting dehydrated because I could barely keep any water down.  Could barely eat and was feeling exhausted_ dizzy_ anxious_ and awful.  I need a root canal but can't get it treated for a couple of weeks_ so was given Cephalexin to help in the meanwhile.  I was scared of the infection getting worse_ so I kept taking it_ but stopped after 8 days because I honestly felt like I was going to die.   Stopped taking it 48 hours ago_ and though I still have diarrhea_ I feel normal again otherwise.  What a horrid experience.   Taking Advil occasionally for pain too_ but no problems with that.
Severe_ extreme_ explosive diarrhea!!!  And peeing a lot.  DO NOT TAKE !!!

SO DIZZY!  My surgeon said that's common with Keflex and she told me to stop it early_ but now it's three days since I stopped it and the ground is still moving when I walk in a really unpleasant way.
Comments: I'm a physician and I've never had side effects to other antibiotics.  Not taking this one again!

Side Effects: After 4 days I had awful tummy cramps_ day 5 I had diareah - blood was present_  I've never had diareah with blood before EVER very frightening. Sweating and I was crying due to the severe stomach cramps that are still here 2 days after stopping this awful medication. I called the dr and said I don't know what you give me but I'm stoping it. My dog bite was small and not more than a few scratches on the skin surface so I have no Idea why I was prescribed this killer drug_ I've had to work for the last 3 days and I can't stand more than 10 mins I feel dizzy_ faint and thirsty_ pee is dark even though I'm drinking_ I'm only eating plain rice and bread etc. very scared what this has done to me I am lying awake with stomach cramps stil wondering when I will be able to make a dr appointment to make sure I'm ok... A different dr though I think god.
Comments: Never again. Ever

Side Effects: Dizzy_ light-headed_ bloating_ felt really thirsty while on it

Reason: Incision on Upper foot was not heal
Side Effects: I started taking this drug because of an infection in my foot due to a cut. The first two days I just felt light headed and a little strange. By the third day I woke up that morning and felt like I was going to pass out. My whole body tingling and weak. I was very scared and went to the ER. They did a lot of tests on me and said it was possible that it could be the cephalexin but rare. I have never felt so awful before and I would not recommend this drug.
Heavy feeling in chest_ severe headache_ felt like water running down neck_ dizziness_ felt like I was going to pass out. Went to ER and they stopped use immediately.
Bad naseua stomach pain light headed dizzy
Nausea and severe diahorrea all evening/night_temperature and vomiting after taking 2 tablets(one midday and one tea time)
Pins and needles feeling in lower back_ going to the bathroom more_ sores on roof of mouth_ chills
Comments: Cellulitis is an infectious disease and since I've had open heart surgery for endocarditis in the past I don't take any chances. I was also prescribed Bactrim at the same time which I had an allergic reaction too. Sores in mouth and severe chapped lips may be from that. Will continue to take Keflex (Cephalexin).

Side Effects: Nightmarish. Spacey. Panicky. Irritable. weird feeling. somewhat blurry vision. Heart racing. Feeling like I have to go to the bathroom every half hour. severe stomach cramps. Very uncomfortable. Anxiety. High pulse. no appetite. Depression. Fatigue. listlessness. nausea. horrible_ horrible dark time for me. what an awful drug. All this to treat a bacterial infection in the salivary glands on the right side of my face. 500 mg 3x/day. had that horrible feeling of will I ever be normal again.

Comments: I would not recommend this. It just makes you feel so ill.

Side Effects: burning and itching....very disturbing

Side Effects: Severe heart palpitations. High blood pressure.  Stomach cramps_ nausea_ headache. Day after stopping still having stomach issues.

Side Effects: Diarrhea stomach pains loss of appetite and the worst yeast infection ever that won't seem to go away just yet.
Comments: Has anyone else had a yeast infection while taking meds?

Side Effects: Within 3 hours of taking first (and only) pill I began vomiting violently.  There was nothing to throw up but the pressure in my chest and stomach with the force of the vomiting mechanism was unbearable.  I went through this every ten minutes or so for 90 minutes.  Then I had the urge to defecate and when I did_  it was pure liquid.  It was as if someone turned on a faucet full blast.  It just kept gushing. This happened three time within 30 minutes.  I was completely exhausted and could barely get to my bed.  Once I got there I experienced the worst chills ever.  I asked my son to turn off the fan and put blankets on me but I still couldn't get warm.  This all happened 2 days ago and I'm STILL wiped out with a scratchy throat and sore muscles.  This was the result of taking ONE PILL!
Comments: there's another drug in this category that caused hives years ago  -K-Flex.

Side Effects: On about the third day_ I began experiencing increased need to defecate. Began as frequent bowel movements_ increasing to as often as every 10 minutes. Also had sharp_ cramping pain in my lower left abdomen. Chills. Loss of appetite. Fatigue. Difficulty concentrating & getting motivated (probably due to fatigue)
Comments: I called the ER that prescribed it & they were pretty dismissive_ telling me it's one of the antibiotics with the least amount of side effects & to keep taking it. I think they're rather irresponsible giving me such a large dose. I'm a rather small Asian female & I'll bet the dosage they put me on was tested on a larger white male.

Side Effects: 3rd day started having abdominal pain_ couldn't eat because my stomach would bloat painfully_4th day moved to upper stomach with diarrhea _ 5 th day face and arm got Numb and I got very confused and  sweaty. Doc said to stop it immediately!

Did the trick though_ surprisingly as I felt worse off for sure!

Reason: Surgery to remove tumor on toe
Side Effects: Gas_ Indigestion_ Stomach pain_ uncomfortable bowel movements_ Headaches_ Lethargy_ Overall bad time.

Irregularities in bowel movements began about 3-4 days into treatment.Metabolism slowed noticeably. Strep cured. Within two days of completion of antibiotic course_ severe acid indigestion made itself present on a regular basis.  Fatigue_ soreness and stomach pain. Still trying to recover.
Comments: Would discourage antibiotic treatments unless there are no other alternatives and it is absolutely necessary. Intestinal damage done by cephalexin_ (Keflex)_ and other antibiotics can be permanent_ even if taken with probiotics.

Feel as though im going to have a heart attack. Major anxiety and head not feeling all there. Feel like i need to call 911 for heart as my arms are numbing and neck is sore. Just a lot of uneasy feeling

Reason: the dr thought a breast  infection
Side Effects: I just feel weird like my head is in a world of its own nausea low appetite heart races shaky nervous veru drowsy  when i start to fall asleep i shake awake and like i said very shaky and very cold they have me taking 500mg 4 times a day is that is too much.So exhausted
I experienced racing heart. Heart palpitations. And Really bad anxiety. Felt a feeling of doom for a little while to. Really bad antibiotic. Never going to take again!! Awful!!
Nausea_ fatigue_ dizziness_ shakiness_ racing heart_ acid reflux_ memory problems_ severe diarrhea
Comments: Was prescribed this for a nail infection. Slow to work and made me feel terrible. Actually thought I needed to go to urgent care as heart was pounding for hours at a time.

I felt like an elephant was sitting on my chest_ started having trouble breathing so called 911. So far major anxiety_ shaking_ stomach cramps_ having to run to the rest room frequently. Especially the first day I took them. Now I am on day 3 and I feel horrible. Tired_ headache and I just feel super weird. Think I will call dr tomorrow
Increases my heart rate
Vomiting_ severe acid reflux_ burned esophagus_ weight loss.

Took one capsule and two hours later felt extremely lethargic and sick. I was then sick and then got diahorea. I am currently pregnant so wasnt certain if the antibiotics were to blame. I then had the second capsule several hours later and was sick a further 3 times. I have decided to stop taking the medication and ask my gp for an alternative. I normally do not have any side affects off medication_  but this is an exeption!

The first couple of days I experienced dizziness and drowsiness shortly after each dose. After about the third day I had no side effects. I was very surprised because I am VERY sensitive and react to EVERY medication I put into my body! I made a point to take probiotics AND eat yogurt daily to avoid bowel and yeast issues. Would take again if needed.
From day one_ started to vomit_ stomach and back pains_ could not eat or drink  anything_ felt extremely tired_ slept on and off for 48 hours_  took myself off this drug after 2 days

Side Effects: since taking Cephalexin I have been having very bad stomach cramps and very tired. My toe is still red and swollen. gas & burping
Comments: Took for approx. one year for chronic bladder infection.  I decided I did not need it anymore.  Quit taking and had a bladder infection within 10 days of stopping.  Am on it again with no problems except gas once again.

Side Effects: Violent vomiting_ severe stomach cramps_ diarrhea_ headache_ fatigue_ joint pain.
Comments: I was taking Cephalexin to treat an abscess caused by the penicilin I had previously taken for strep throat. I was supposed to take the Cephalexin 4x a day for 10 days. I only took 2 or 3 a day due to feeling nauseous and diarrhea. On the 7th day I took all 4 pills throughout the day. The next morning I woke up and my stomach was in extreme distress. I was vomiting uncontrollably. Mostly bile. I was taken by ambulance and admitted to the hospital where they gave me anti-nausea medication as well as a painkiller. I was there for 8 hours before I stopped vomiting. It's now been 2 days since this happened and I am still fighting all the symptoms_ including the nausea. This is the first and last time I will ever take this medication.

Side Effects: Diarrhea_ extreme fatigue while taking. Severe cramps that woke me up every night for I finished taking it. Still having diarrhea_ absolutely no energy during the day and sleeping a lot and achy legs. Been off it for two weeks and my toe infection returned.

I just feel lousy_ like I have the flu. Lethargic_ nauseous and irritable!! Not a great appetite and thirsty all the time. I called the pharmacy and pharmacist says this is typical for this drug. I will continue to take it because abscess is pretty bad!!!
diarrhea_ chest pain/acid reflux_ stomach cramping_ severe vomiting_ felt like I had the flu_ etc.
Comments: Took this drug for about about 5 days_ was supposed to take it every six hours but only ended up taking it two times a day and stopped before I was supposed to because it was so painful_ got diarrhea immediately_ had chest pain leading to what I thought was the stomach flu but now I believe was from this drug. Continue to have chest pain_ wouldn't give this drug to my worst enemy. DO NOT TAKE!

Reason: infected bug bite on my leg
Side Effects: I started having severe stomach cramps and diarrhea the night I started using this drug. I also felt like I had the flu fora day and shortness of breath. But the worst is the stomach pain. I stopped using it after 4 days (prescribed for 7) and it has been 2 days and the side effects persist. I can only eat a simple diet (toast_ potatoes_ rice etc.) which is not good because I am 29 weeks pregnant!
Comments: I would never ever use this drug again! This is the first time I am reacting to a medicine like this. Usually have a string digestive system.

Side Effects: I'm on my third day taking it for a bestBreast infection. It makes me so sleepy_ not hungry and it have me a nasty taste in my mouth. I hope I don't develop any other symptoms. Oh and gas.At least it took away the swelling_ pain and bloody discharge I had.
Anxiety_ racing heart_ difficulty sleeping.
Comments: The first 3 doses didn't seem to make me feel badly_ but shortly after the 4th pill I started getting anxious. I had only recently been getting over a period of anxiety in my life which I had never experienced before_ so I'm not positive that the Cephalexin kicked it back in gear. However_ nothing else has been going on to make me anxious_ so I'm blaming it on the drug.

Side Effects: Rapid heart rate and chest pain_ vision impairment_ pain in teeth_ dizziness_ headache_ rash_ nausea
Comments: I has take  Bactrim which made me hurt a lot so I got prescription changed to this.  I took 1 pill and had never had these types of side effects from antibiotics!  I am slightly allergic to penicillin but was told by my doctor and pharmacist this should be ok_ and several hours later my eyes felt like they plastic over them things were so foggy!  My teeth hurt a lot as did my abdominal area (which is what I was taking it for)_ and the chest pains and heart palpitations were bad (and this is NOT listed as a side effect even though it is apparently common).  The nausea and headache didn't really occur until about 8 hours later.  This was too much for me_ I couldn't even make it to the 2nd dose_ very bad reaction.

Side Effects: became very ill_ flu like_ diarreah_ blacked out_ then began bleeding from rectum without any stool. After a day of this_ admitted to hospital for the next 2 days and had colonoscopy along with other tests for bacteria and such.
Comments: All results aren't back yet_ but was told not to take the drug_ but that it probably didn't cause this reaction.I'm convinced it did_ since this had never happened before_ and stopped the next day after I quit taking the drug. Unfortunately_ the docs wouldnt let me go until other things were ruled out_ due to the blood loss.

Side Effects: Diarrhea_Body aches_Upset stomache_Gas.One day it even made me feel like i had the flu.
Comments: This drug makes you feel awful!! And it smells really bad!!!

Side Effects: Extreme Anxiety_ Panic Attacks_ Difficulty Breathing_ Loss of Appetite. Fast Heart Rate and Pulse.
Comments: Only took for 2 days. Could not handle the anxiety.

Side Effects: No side effect other than minor gas.
Comments: Have some infection on index finger after surgery. Cephalexin did nothing for it after taking 108 pills.

Side Effects: Really bad bout of ThrushReally bad indigestion which is still ongoingStomach crampsReally bad acne when normally very clear skin
Comments: Took the drug for 6 of the 7 days I should have taken the tablets due to the Thrush. Given this because I am allergic to Penicillin. The symptoms abated but never went away and are now back.

Side Effects: I believe I developed acid reflux disease!!!
Comments: Had to quit taking it on the 6th day due to gas. I am now experiencing awful pain between the shoulder blades and pain in legs. Would not take this again!

Side Effects: Maybe a little tiredness but aside from that none!
Comments: LIFE SAVER. Doctor prescribed this with clindamycin topical gel to help my acne and within DAYS I had seen a huge improvement. No reportable side effects and my face is as clear as ever!

Side Effects: Terrible joint pain_ especially in back and neck; pretty bad acid reflux; headache. Tylenol does not help these problems.  No diarrhea or gas like others mentioned.
Comments: Terrible joint pain_ especially in  neck/shoulder area_ and back; pretty bad acid reflux;  chronic headache. Tylenol does not help these problems.  No diarrhea or gas like others mentioned. I was given this for mile cystic acne. It does seem to help that_ temporarily_ but these side effects are horrible.

Side Effects: I was sick 10 weeks.  I had sore throat_ persistent chills_ and some dizziness with illness_ but after taking this drug_ dizziness worsened and I had hiccups too once a day for five minutes.  Inflammation in chest worsened.  Swollen glands under arms reduced by 50%_ but still hurt after completing drug. Sore throat resolved after six weeks.  Was it due to drug??? I eat yogurt every day any how and did not experience yeast infection.
Comments: Noticed new symptom after completing drug_ added to my chills_ were intense icy cold sensations in the skin of my thighs and butt.  Skin felt cold as well.  Never experienced this before and don't know the cause. Had to take Ibuprofen for some relief.

Side Effects: Contracted C. Diff -- sick_ sick sick sick sick 3 weeks later.  Make sure you REALLY need to take this before ingesting any.
Comments: STOP this drug the very SECOND you get diarrhea.  Ugh.

Side Effects: I was prescribed Cephalexin for cellulitis in my right ring finger after adverse side affects from Clindamycin and sulfur meds. I have had NON-STOP diarrhea after taking it for two days. I am also on the BRAT diet and Gatorade. I am losing sleep from chronic diarrhea and rush to the bathroom at work. My mom and I are praying this will end. I told my doctor I stopped taking it. I never experienced diarrhea like this. I'm angry this drug is on the market. I'm worried this will be part of my life now.
Comments: Didn't help my infection and is causing me misery..

Side Effects: I had to take a one pill in the morning and one at night for 7 days. By the 6th day_ I developed a yeast infection. I know this is a downfall in antibiotics but the first time it has happened to me. Also made me gasey and have to frequent the bathroom. And similar to other antibiotics the pills stink!
Comments: I do not know how well this medication works because I was never sick_ I took this med as preventive care after a surgery. I just know the itching from the yeast infection was horrible_ I just started medication for that today.

Side Effects: painful bloating_ constant gas_ inability to digest food normally_ unintended weight loss (went 10 percent below my normal weight)_ constant thirst_ shakiness caused by low blood sugar
Comments: Took this med 15 years ago at age 27 and my digestive system has never fully recovered. Almost immediately lost ability to digest milk_ followed by impaired ability to digest any food. Food passed thru my system in as little as 30 min. I ate all meals alone for one year due to unbelievable amount of gas. Extensive probiotics helped. I used digestive enzymes for months_ also helped.

Side Effects: Thrush_ but this was easily cleared by using an over the counter pharmacy product. Sore throat (possibly not related)
Comments: This cured my cystitis very quickly_ much more so than other antibiotics I have been given previously. It did give me a bout of thrush on days 2-5_ but completely cleared the cystitis symptoms within 24 hours. Really pleased with result as I had resigned myself to at least 48hrs of pain.Also_ someone else mentioned an allergy to penicillin may make this drug unsuitable for you. I'm allergy to penicillin and was fine.

Side Effects: I got major stomach aches_lots of abdominal cramping_diarrhea_and nausea that would not go away. I have been off Cephalexin for several days_ and my bad symtoms_and side effects will not go away! I feel the sickest I have ever been! This antibiotic has destroyed the lining of my stomach_ and done damage to my intestines.I would stay 100% away from it entirely. After all that_ it did not cure my sinus infection.
Comments: Do not recommend it at all. It is really toxic_ and bad.

Side Effects: none
Comments: My 9yo boy went from severe pain and fever to running and playing within 12 hours.  By 24 hours he was back at school.  He responded very well to this med.

Side Effects: I got a stomachache that was constant. Then I got severe diarrhea. I couldn't leave my apartment for 1 1/2 weeks and could only eat the BRAT diet (I also added yogurt)_ even a few days after I returned to work. I started burping and other funky noises stemming from gas in my stomach (150+ times per day!)_ and had too much acid_ too.  Many doctors said I was just swallowing air.  I told them I was swallowing the same way I did for the first 28 years of my life.  My present doctor told me I have acid reflux and will for the rest of my life.
Comments: I won't go near this drug with a 20-foot pole. I do realize many take it with no problems. I'm just one of those that can't. I count it as an allergy even if no doctor has specifically said that. Having it down as an allergy on my records will keep them from giving it to me. (Age listed here is the age at which I took this medicine.)

Side Effects: Tired!  I was in bed by 8 pm everyday when taking this med.  Really lythargic as well....
Comments: I was on it for 10 days - after the 2nd day my spider bite (which was really severe) had stopped throbbing and swelling.  it was hard to remember the 3 x a day for 10 days though :)

Side Effects: I do not believe that this medication did anything for my bronchitis that time and rest could not have done alone.  On top of everything else_ this antibiotic gave me a serious yeast infection.
Comments: Beware of taking this drug if you are female.  Most of my female friends end up with yeast infections after taking cephalexin.

Side Effects: First 2 days_ symptoms were much worse before better.  Improvements after about 5 days_ but after day 6_ the infection returned - plus the smell and taste is from hell...

Cephalexin attacked my colon and was near death until they discovered the cause.  Operation had to be done to repair colon.  Doctor said that he was not responsible.  I was in hospital for two weeks and only after a year and a half have I recovered completly.  The doctor said only 1% have this reaction but who wants to be the 1%?
Comments: Would not advise anyone to take this med.

Side Effects: Some stomach side effects_ no bad_ mainly cramps
Comments: This is the second time I take it for sinus infections... It's ok.

Side Effects: Could not tell if I was having problems due to strep throat_ or the med (night sweats_ racing heart_ panic attacks).  Unsure...
Comments: It cured my 6 week old case of strep throat after Levaquin_ Zithromax and Erithromycin failed.  Read somewhere that Strep is not resistant to Penicilin (which I am allergic to)_ but can do something with enzymes to make it less effective.  This drug combines the effectivness of Penicilin and is not impacted by the enzyme thing (so it said...).  Be careful_ there is a 20-30 percent chance that you will react to this if allergic to penicilin.  For me_ it was worth the risk.
